item.title: waPC and MsgPack (Rust|Golang)
item.description: As my reader will know (Hey Mom!), I’ve been noodling around with WASM and waPC. I’ve been exploring ways to pass structured messages across the host:guest boundary. Protobufs was my first choice. @KevinHoffman created waPC and waSCC and he explained to me and that wSCC uses Message Pack. It’s slightly surprising to me (still) that technologies like this exist with everyone else seemingly using them and I’ve not heard of them.
